com.brightcove.drm.widevine
Class RegistrationTask

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,android.drm.DrmInfo>
      com.brightcove.drm.widevine.RegistrationTask

public class RegistrationTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,android.drm.DrmInfo>

This class registers the device with the DRM server. It configures the DRM plugin for use with the portal and identifies the asset storage DB location. This task should only be executed once and prior to performing any other DRM requests. The return value of this task is a DrmInfo object on success or null on failure. This is an asynchronous task. Example usage 

 AsyncTask<Void, Void, DrmInfo> task = new RegistrationTask(mDrmManagerClient, "brightcove");
 DrmInfo result = task.execute().get();
 if (result != null) {
   // success
 } else {
   // failure
 }
